name: Winter Eladrin
damage_resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks

special_abilities.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4–6)
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The eladrin’s innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Sorrowful Presence.
special_abilities.desc: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin’s Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Longsword.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) slashing damage, or 5 (1d10) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow. Ranged Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Frigid Rebuke.
reactions.desc: When the eladrin takes damage from a creature the eladrin can see within 60 feet of it, the eladrin can force that creature to succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) cold damage.
